article:
Christopher Reeve made many successful films and TV shows but he is most famous for his Superman films. Unfortunately, disaster came in 1995 when he   _  from his horse and broke
his back. The doctors said he was not going to  pull through  . However, he didn't  give up  and made  _  progress. At first, he couldn't breathe
without a machine, but he learnt to breathe  _  his own. He would
never walk again but he started a new life with great  _  . The second
year after his accident, Christopher returned to film making. He also  _  a lot of money to  _  medical research into back injuries. He made speeches all over the USA about his experiences. This not only  _  public
attention to research into back injuries but also encouraged a lot of people
living with all kinds of problems. Christopher also got  involved  with charity
work to help disabled people. People all over the world will always remember
Christopher as a superhero
